data.product_title: MEDLIFE ESSENTIALS APPLE CIDER VINEGAR (PACK OF 1)
data.product_longDescription:
Quick Overview

Medlife Essentials’ Apple Cider Vinegar with 'Mother' is 100% Natural, Unfiltered and Unpasteurized with no artificial preservatives. It is obtained by natural fermentation of the fresh and raw juice of apples hand-picked from the orchards of Upper Himalayan belt (Himachal Pradesh) and matured in wooden barrels made of oak wood to give it the unique flavor.

The special cold press technology used to process Medlife ACV retains its highly beneficial, pectin-based natural substances and procyanidins, thus, imparting it a high medicinal value. It is also a natural source of Potassium, Sodium, and Calcium. Medlife ACV provides multiple health benefits on regular use. ACV is studied and proven to be highly useful for diabetic patients, heart patients and for the obese in weight management. Also useful in delayed gastric emptying, acne-prone skins and for hair health.

Benefits:

  • Apple Cider Vinegar helps to lose weight, control High BP, Sugar & Cholesterol and improves digestion.
  • Medlife Essentials’ Apple Cider Vinegar has potent antioxidant activity.
  • Apple Cider Vinegar is rich in nutrients and gut-friendly bacteria.
  • On using as a hair rinse, it helps make the hair soft, silky and shiny. ACV is known to control dandruff & hair fall.
  • Apple Cider Vinegar helps prevent acne and pimples when applied on skins prone to acne.

Nutritional Information per 100 ml:

Energy

5.48 Kcal

Protein

0.5 g

Carbohydrate

1.37g

Sugar

0 g

Fat

0 g

Dietary Fiber

0.5 g

Iron

0.40 mg

Potassium

99.97 mg

Sodium

25.10 mg

Calcium

5.08 mg

 

Dosage: Dilute 10 ml of ACV in a glass of water and have it twice daily on an empty stomach in the morning and in the mid-afternoon or as directed by the physician. Shake well before use.

Storage conditions: Store in a cool and dry place. Protect from sunlight. Keep out of reach of children.

Caution: Do not consume pure vinegar directly, always dilute with water. Rinse your mouth after consuming it.

Shelf life: 18 months from the date of manufacture

Form: Liquid

About Brand:
Medlife Essentials, an initiative by Medlife.com, is a dedicated line of dietary supplements, Ayurvedic and herbal formulations that prevent or manage common diseases. All herbal products of Medlife Essentials are made with 100% natural ingredients with proven efficacy.

About Manufacturer:
The manufacturer's aim is to provide high quality but affordable health and wellness solutions to people across the globe. They have a diversified product profile that covers herbals, nutraceuticals, OTC drugs, pharmaceutical formulations with brands that have created a strong identity and value in their respective segments.

 

 

FAQs:

  • What is Apple Cider Vinegar used for?

Apple Cider Vinegar is used for diabetic patients, heart patients and for the obese in weight management. It is also useful in delayed gastric emptying, acne-prone skins and for hair health.

  • Are there any side effects associated with Livsupport Tablet?

No side effects of Apple Cider Vinegar have been reported till date.

  • What dose of Apple Cider Vinegar should I take daily?

Dilute 10 ml of ACV in a glass of water and have it twice daily on an empty stomach in the morning and in the mid-afternoon or as directed by the physician.

  • Is Apple Cider Vinegar safe to use during pregnancy?

The pregnant women should take Apple Cider Vinegar on doctor’s advice.

  • Is Apple Cider Vinegar safe to use for infants and children?

Prior consultation to your doctor is advisable in such cases.

  • Is Apple Cider Vinegar safe to use during lactation?

 

The lactating women should take Apple Cider Vinegar on doctor’s advice.

QUICK OVERVIEW:

A natural blend of Neem and Turmeric bring together their antibacterial and antifungal properties improve general skin health and help to even out your skin tone. It also enhances the blood circulation and clears clogged pores.

Suitable for all skin types. Best for acne-prone skin.

For better results, pair it with Himalaya Purifying Neem Face Wash.

 20 gm

Wash or cleanse face, and apply a small quantity of Pimple Clear Cream over the affected areas twice dai

data.product_title: PENTASURE 2.0 VANILLA 100% PURE WHEY PROTEIN FOR BODY BUILDING
data.product_longDescription:
QUICK OVERVIEW:

Pentasure 2.0 is a nutritional supplement or a sole source of nutrition for patients who are at risk of malnutrition, particularly those with high energy and protein requirements and/or fluid restrictions.

Ideal for the patients who are on dialysis, liver cirrhosis and ascites, corpulmonale etc.

BENEFITS OF PENTASURE 2.0:

  • Contains 35gm of 100% pure whey protein
  • Gluten, sucrose and cholesterol free

NUTRITIONAL FACTS:

SHELF LIFE: 

Best before 15 months from the date of mfg.

PACKAGE CONTENT:

400 gm

DIRECTION FOR USE:

Add 110 ml of milk to 4 level spoons of Pentasure 2.0 Protein Powder in a clean glass. Stir thoroughly and drink immediately.

STORAGE INFORMATION:

Store in a cool and dry place. Keep away from direct sunlight. Once opened, use the content within 1 month.

CAUTION:

Not for parenteral use. Not intended for use in children below 4 years.

data.product_title: PURO HEALTHY SALT - ROCK SALT (PACK OF 1)
data.product_longDescription:
QUICK OVERVIEW:

Puro Healthy Salt is unrefined and natural - free of bleaches, chemicals, anti-caking agents and other impurities that you might find in your regular iodized salt. With over 80 minerals like Calcium, Magnesium, Potassium, Zinc and naturally occurring traces of Iodine essential for holistic well-being, Puro Healthy Salt is a natural and healthier alternative to iodized salt. Even with its impressive mineral profile, it doesn't compromise on taste.

BENEFITS PURO HEALTHY SALT:

  • Good for Heart Health - Lesser sodium controls Blood pressure and presence of Potassium along with over 84 minerals like Zinc, magnesium helps in maintaining healthy heart
  • Good for Digestion - Maintains healthy pH of 7 necessary for optimum functioning of the digestive system
  • Good for Bone Health - Presence of natural traces of calcium, phosphorous and magnesium helps strengthen bones and prevents from bone disorders like osteoporosis and arthritis
  • Good for Weight Loss - Fluid balance due to low sodium content prevents bloating and excess weight gain, improves metabolism.

 
 

KEY FEATURES:

  • PURITY - This All-Natural salt is sourced from pristine, unpolluted, untouched natural resources, with no chemicals or additives and is brought to you straight from nature.
  • HEALTH - Recommended by health experts, this salt has 84 trace minerals like Potassium, Iron, Iodine etc naturally present and a pH > 7 which balances the acidic reflux in your body.
  • TASTE - Top chefs worldwide recommend this tasty salt due to its earthy and lasting taste that makes every bite delicious when you cook, bake or simply sprinkle on your food.
  • ANCIENT WISDOM - Mentioned as the best amongst various salts in Ayurveda, this rock salt has several benefits including improving digestion, heart health, eyesight & overall well-being

INGREDIENTS:

Edible mineral Salt

SHELF LIFE:

36 months from the date of Packing

data.product_title: CONTROL D GLUCOSE METER KIT WITH 10 STRIP
data.product_longDescription:
QUICK OVERVIEW:

Control D is the next generation Blood Glucose monitor using advanced Amperometric Biosensors to measure accurate blood glucose using a low volume of blood in 5 seconds. This glucometer helps to adjust the daily requirement fo sugar in your diet. It is easy-to-use, handy and?ÿfits in the pocket.?ÿ

IDEAL FOR:

Type 1 and 2 Diabetic patients

FEATURES:

  • C Electrodes for accurate readings
  • Laser pattern ensures precision
  • No coding required
  • Safe strip handling
  • Easy to use and fits in the pocket

TECHNICAL SPECIFICATIONS:

  • Test Method - Amperometric Biosensors
  • Analysis Time ƒ?? 5 sec
  • Sample Volume ƒ?? 0.5 microliters
  • Underdosing detection: Yes
  • Memory ƒ?? 500 readings
  • Battery ƒ?? CR2032
  • Battery Life - Approx. 1000 tests or one year

  • Meter Size ƒ?? 10.0 x 3.1 x 1.4 cm

HOW TO USE:

CAUTION:

Keep out of reach of children. Do not open test strip phial until you are ready to test. The strip should not be shared. Keep away from direct sunlight.

NOTE: PINHEALTH OFFERS THE MAXIMUM BENEFITS OF LONGER EXPIRY DATES FOR MONITORING DEVICES, TEST STRIPS AND LANCETS TO OUR CUSTOMERS.

Quick Overview:
Omron MC-246 Digital Thermometer is a compact and easy-to-use thermometer. It has a flexible tip that provides added comfort and safety. This thermometer eliminates any worries about broken glass and mercury hazards. It s for oral, rectal and underarm temperature measurement.

Features:

  • Flexible tip
  • Accurate measurement
  • Water resistant
  • Recalls the last temperature
  • Beeps when measurement is completed

Specifications:
Model No. MC-246
Sensing unit - Thermistor
Temperature display - 3-digit, + C ( F) display in 0.1 degree increment
Measurement Range - 32.0 C to 42.0 C (89.6 to 107.6 F)
Weight - 12gm
Main material - Hard Plastic

About Brand: 
Omron Healthcare India Pvt Ltd is offering medical technologies and products for Monitoring and Therapy. Their aim is to offer products where people can enjoy healthy and comfortable lives. Their products include home blood pressure monitors, thermometer, nebulizer, fitness tools such as pedometers and heart rate monitors, TENS Units, Scales, & much more!
